poem:
### In the Corridors of Power

They speak of corridors,  
not of the sick laid low,  
but in grey-walled halls  
where decisions grow—  
lands and lives a game.  
Normalcy skewed,  
a flick of a pen  
while distant cries  
hang in the air, unseen,  
beneath the sterile light.
